content: I see. So, I would need to include an ingredient list and allergen warning on my jam labels, but not a nutrition facts label. And for honey, I just need to include the net quantity and product name. Got it! By the way, I've been thinking of repurposing an old plow I found in the barn to use in the garden. Do you think that's a good idea, or should I just stick with modern gardening tools?
